it.polimi.se2018.network

Interface ServerInterface<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the client with which the server will communicate
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImplementationRMI, ServerImplementationSocket

    public interface ServerInterface<T>
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A representation of the server to be utilized by the clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notify(PlayerMessage playerMessage)
      Notify the real server
      java.lang.Boolean reconnect(T client, java.lang.Integer id)
      Asks to the real server to reconnect an already connected player
      java.lang.Integer registerClient(T client, java.lang.String name)
      Asks to the real server to register a new client
      void sendHeartbeat(HeartbeatMessage heartbeatMessage)
      Send heartbeat to real server

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        void notify(PlayerMessage playerMessage)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Notify the real server
        Parameters:
        playerMessage - message which will be notified by the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • registerClient

        java.lang.Integer registerClient(T client,
                                 java.lang.String name)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Asks to the real server to register a new client
        Parameters:
        client - interface of the client
        name - name of the player who wants to be registered
        Returns:
        the id representing univocally the client/player in the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendHeartbeat

        void sendHeartbeat(HeartbeatMessage heartbeatMessage)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send heartbeat to real server
        Parameters:
        heartbeatMessage - message describing the heartbeat sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • reconnect

        java.lang.Boolean reconnect(T client,
                            java.lang.Integer id)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Asks to the real server to reconnect an already connected player
        Parameters:
        client - interface of the client
        id - integer given to the client during the call to registerClient
        Returns:
        true if the client reconnected successfully, false if not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
